text: This is a list of every song recorded by the American pop rock band Imagine Dragons. This includes singles, covers, soundtrack songs, collaborations, and unreleased songs. == List of songs == Key Single release Name of song, featured performers, writers, originating album, and year released. (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack), Origins 2018 == Unreleased songs == Name of song, writers, and any other notes Song Writer(s) Notes Ref. "Black" * Title appears on a whiteboard in the album trailer for Smoke + Mirrors "Born Yesterday" Dan Reynolds Alexander Grant Josh Mosser * Registered by the American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers (ASCAP) "Bottle of Coke" * First appeared on a demo CD from 2008 "Clouds" Dan Reynolds Wayne Sermon Ben McKee * Registered by the American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers (ASCAP) * First appeared on a demo CD from 2008 * Lyrics have undergone several revisions * Performed on the PBS program Vegas In Tune "Crash Course" * Title appears on a whiteboard in The Making of Night Visions documentary "Curtain Call" Dan Reynolds * Reynolds performed the song in 2008 * Appeared on a demo CD from 2008 "Dazed" Dan Reynolds Wayne Sermon Ben McKee Daniel Platzman Tim Randolph * Registered by the American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers (ASCAP) "Darkness" * Performed for an episode of AUDIO-FILES * Audio of the performance included on a compilation album of deep cuts available on the band's official website "Destroyed" * Appears on a whiteboard in the album trailer for Smoke + Mirrors "Everyone Believes" * Title appears on a whiteboard in The Making of Night Visions documentary * A brief clip of McKee recording bass for the song appears in the documentary, confirmed by manager Mac Reynolds "Execution" * Title appears on a whiteboard in the album trailer for Smoke + Mirrors "Falling Into You" * No known official title, colloquially known as "Falling Into You" * Featured in a 2010 video of the band working on their It's Time EP "February" * First appeared on a demo CD from 2008 * Included on a compilation album of deep cuts available on the band's official website "Give It a Break" * The name, given by fans, has not been confirmed * Fans have also referred to the track by "Insane" * Featured in a 2010 video of the band working on their It's Time EP "I Am Just A Sailor" * No known official title, colloquially known as "I Am Just A Sailor" * Featured in a 2010 video of the band working on their It's Time EP "I Wish You Well" * First performed live at The Velour in April 2010 * Studio version snippet first appeared in a May 2010 episode of the Blue Microphones podcast "Nine Lives" * Title appears on a whiteboard in a photo posted by engineer Matt Sedivy in 2021 "Off to War" * First appeared on a demo CD from 2008 "Spaces In Between" * Title appears on a whiteboard in a photo posted by engineer Matt Sedivy in 2021 "Starlight" * First performed live in 2010 as part of "30 Lives" * The studio demo and official acoustic versions of "30 Lives" do not include the "Starlight" section "Stars" * First written in 2008 * No recording of this song exists, but the lyrics have been posted online in full by an unknown source and were partially confirmed by the band when they played it during a 2021 livestream at a fan's request "Start All Over" * Title appears on a whiteboard in the album trailer for Smoke + Mirrors "Stay" * Title appears on a whiteboard in a photo posted by engineer Matt Sedivy in 2021 "Take My Heart Away" Dan Reynolds * Demo recorded by Reynolds in August 2019, live on Twitch * Included on a compilation album of deep cuts available on the band's official website "Thank You" * Title appears on a whiteboard in a photo posted by engineer Matt Sedivy in 2021 "Unseen" * First appeared on a demo CD from 2008 "Volume Drops" * First appeared on a demo CD from 2008 "We All Fall Down" * Performed once on August 6, 2010 * The name, given by fans, has not been confirmed == References == Category:Lists of songs by recording artists *
title: List of songs recorded by Imagine Dragons
